longBusinessSummary: Nova Agritech Limited manufactures, distributes, and markets agri-inputs. It offers crop nutrition products, including NPJ, element, straight nitrogen and potassium, and micronutrient fertilizers; soil health management products, which include organic and bio fertilizers; and insecticides, fungicides, herbicides, and plant growth regulators. The company also provides bio-stimulant products, bio pesticide products, integrated pest management products, and crop protection products, as well as technologies. In addition, it offers crop seeds. Nova Agritech Limited was incorporated in 2007 and is based in Siddipet, India.
